title: Saikyou Koibana: Sweet & Erotic Best 5
original_name: 最強コイバナ ～スイート&エロティックベスト 5 ～
sinopse:
A collection of sexy short stories from some of Shogakukan's most popular authors.

1. Houkago Wedding (After School Wedding) [Shinjou Mayu]
2. Platinum Talk [Doumoto Nao]
3. Kinkyori Renai (Close Distance Love) Yamada Komomo
4. Koi ni Naru made (Until I Fall in Love) [Yumachi Shin]
5. Juunen, Koishita (In Love for 10 Years) Osakabe Mashin
